Package org.gradle.workers

Interface WorkerSpec

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassLoaderWorkerSpec, ForkingWorkerSpec, ProcessWorkerSpec, WorkerConfiguration
    @Incubating
public interface WorkerSpec
    Represents the common configuration of a worker. Used when submitting an item of work to the WorkerExecutor.
    Since:
    5.6
